snippet: The F.D.A. released a sharply worded warning letter to St. Jude Medical in which it said it might soon fine the company for failing to address agency concerns.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration releases sharply worded warning letter to St Jude Medical in which it says it might soon fine company or take other actions for failing to address agency concerns about widely used heart device component called the Durata, which connects implanted defibrillator to patient's heart.
lead_paragraph: The F.D.A. released a sharply worded warning letter to St. Jude Medical in which it said it might soon fine the company for failing to address agency concerns.

headline.seo: F.D.A. Threatens to Discipline St. Jude on Heart Device
headline.main: F.D.A. Threatens to Discipline St. Jude on Heart Device
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Threatens to Discipline St. Jude on Heart Device
